name: Social Safety Net Champions
title: Top Social Protection Programs
description: In 2018, Laos ranked among the highest globally with 90.86% of total welfare of beneficiary households covered by social protection and labor programs.

name: Reading Challenges Ahead
title: High Learning Poverty Rates
description: In 2019, 97% of female and 98% of male pupils in Laos were below minimum reading proficiency at the end of primary school, indicating significant challenges in education.

name: Renewable Energy Setbacks
title: Negative Renewable Energy Production
description: In 2021, Laos reported a negative electricity production from renewable sources, excluding hydroelectric, with a value of -4,489,800,000 kWh, highlighting a need for improvement in sustainable energy.

name: Minimal UN Aid
title: Low UN Agency Financial Flows
description: In 2022, Laos received $100,406 from UN agencies like the WFP, one of the lowest figures globally, suggesting limited international financial support.

name: Financial Measurement Pioneers
title: Innovative Financial Intermediary Services
description: In 2015, Laos recorded a Financial Intermediary Services Indirectly Measured (FISIM) value of 100 in local currency, showcasing its unique approach to financial services.
